TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComboBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods used to render a combo box control with visual styles.

span.span: Provides methods used to render a combo box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现一个组合框控件的操作系统当前视觉样式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a combo box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制的组合框，请使用方法，以便绘制的文本框和方法用于绘制下拉箭头。To draw a combo box, use the method to draw the text box and the method to draw the drop-down arrow. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区和将绘制当前视觉样式的组合框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, and will draw the combo box with the current visual style. 否则，这些方法将引发。Otherwise, these methods will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类将包装的功能设置为公开的元素之一和类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件和方法来绘制响应鼠标单击的组合框。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a combo box that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法在自定义控件的方法来绘制鼠标指针位置所确定的状态的下拉箭头。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a drop-down arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
